data.title: Davidson College
data.meta_description: Ben Gordon SniffenMid-Distance/Distance - 2021 Outdoor (Redshirt Freshman): Ran a leg of the second-place 4x800m relay team and also competed in the open 800...
data.text:
2021 Outdoor (Redshirt Freshman):

Ran a leg of the second-place 4x800m relay team and also competed in the open 800m at the Atlantic 10 Championship (5/2) … Claimed second in the 800m with a time of 1:52.47 at the USC Open (4/17) … Crossed the line in second in 3:52.28 over 1500m at the Charlotte Invitational (4/24) … Came home second in the 5k with a time of 15:22.33 at the 49er Classic (3/20) … Was fifth in the half mile at the Vertklasse Meeting (4/2) … Broke 4:00 in the 1500m at the Mason Spring Invitational (4/11) ... Atlantic 10 Commissioner's Honor Roll.

2019-20 Indoor (Freshman):

Was second in the 800m with a time of 1:56.98 and helped the 4x800m relay take second at the Mondo College Invitational (2/2) … Took sixth in the 600m with a time of 1:24.82 at the Camel City Invitational (2/7) … Stopped the clock at 2:28.16 in the 1k at the BU Valentine Invitational (2/15) … Took fourth in the 1000m at the JDL January College Kick-off (1/19) … Was sixth in the mile with a time of 4:30.49 at the JDL Early Bird Invitational (12/8) … Ran a leg of the fifth-place finishing 4x800m relay team and also competed in the 1k at the Atlantic 10 Championship (3/1).
